title: Know about me
text:
Know about me
Hello I am Raunak

title: Raunak Farhaz
text:
I am currently doing my Doctorate in Theoretical Chemistry in Humboldt-Universit√§t zu Berlin. I do method development, primarily focussing in the field of Multiresolution Analysis. I love computers and programming and I have an expertise in Fortran77, C++, Julia and Python. Besides science I love to cook and am an avid music lover.
I love teaching, hence you will find my tutorial videos and lecture notes in the teaching section of this website.
For relevant research collaboration please contact me through my email.
Nice to meet you !

title: Quarto is Super
text:
What is Quarto?
Quarto is a markup language which can be used to generate beautiful technical or scientific documents.


What can be done with it?
Many things can be done like:

Blogs/Websites
Articles
Presentations
Book

and also one can render
